title: FS:1895 Mayo N300 Billy Nash Boston SOLD

posts.post_title: FS:1895 Mayo N300 Billy Nash Boston SOLD
posts.post_content: Hello.Im looking to sell this N300 Billy Nash.Price includes confirmed delivery.Im asking 155.00.Reverse is in excellent shape and a scan is available upon request.Please contact me however is most convenient to you.Thank you.
